description: Use a 'doubts and queries' section in hackathons to improve participant engagement.
rationale: Having a dedicated section for queries and doubts during a hackathon allows participants to get their questions answered in real-time. This not only helps them to progress in the competition but also fosters a sense of community and engagement, as participants see that their concerns are being addressed.
notes: site: Kaggle Discussions | author: CTAI Foundation | tacit: True

description: Use ensemble learning to improve your model's performance.
rationale: Ensemble learning methods combine multiple models to create a more robust and accurate prediction. This approach can help to overcome the weaknesses of a single model and improve overall performance.
use_case: Improving model accuracy in machine learning
notes: site: Kaggle Discussions | author: Chris Deotte | tacit: True
